text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I did it... I did it, I did it! Hehe!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's my day off, so I head downtown.<n>There, I bump into a
rather jovial Rice<n>Shower.
choice_data_list: Looks like you're in a good mood, Rice!
Looks like you're in a good mood, Rice!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah, Big Brother! Hehe... Mhm.<n>Today's a good day!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah, Big Sister! Hehe... Mhm. Today's<n>a good day!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Well, um... I got a ticket for the stage<n>adaptation of "The Blue
Rose of Good<n>Fortune."

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: If I recall correctly, that's the picture<n>book Rice loves.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Thanks!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
You know how I always end up<n>bringing misfortune... So
usually I<n>avoid places like the theater, with lots<n>of people.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But... But, you see... Th-this play is<n>special, because...

text_block_list.name: Black Cat
text_block_list.text: Meooow!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eep?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Out of nowhere, a black cat snatches<n>Rice's ticket from her
pocket and runs<n>away!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: N-no way! Mr. Kitty, wait up!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower gives chase to the black<n>cat, and I quickly
follow behind!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... It went this way!

text_block_list.name: Construction Worker
text_block_list.text:
Slow down there, missy! Sorry, but<n>this road's blocked off
for<n>construction.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! Wh-what should I do? Mr. Kitty<n>definitely went this
way!

text_block_list.name: Construction Worker
text_block_list.text:
Well, I could show you the detour...<n>But that hill's a real
killer.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ah... Sh-show me, please! A hill won't<n>be a problem... I can
run!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Big Brother, let me know if you get<n>tired, okay? I can hold
your hand!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Big Sister, let me know if you get<n>tired, okay? I can hold
your hand!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... There you are!

text_block_list.name: Black Cat
text_block_list.text: Meow! Meow!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Mhm, sneaky beaky-like! Come here,<n>Mr. Kitty, I won't
bite—promise!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice and I slowly creep up to the cat,<n>when suddenly, I feel
something<n>under my foot!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eep!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Owie... What's a banana peel doing<n>here—and two, at that!
You okay, Big<n>Brother?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Owie... What's a banana peel doing<n>here—and two, at that!
You okay, Big<n>Sister?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
By the time we're back on our feet,<n>the cat is nowhere to
be seen. We<n>didn't even see which direction it ran<n>off in...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Big Brother, I'll go ask around and<n>see if anyone's spotted
Mr. Kitty.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Big Sister, I'll go ask around and see<n>if anyone's spotted
Mr. Kitty.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower stands up, musters all<n>her courage, and begins
asking the<n>people nearby for info.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: E-e-excuse me! Have you seen a<n>black cat around here?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice and I keep searching for the<n>black cat. Some time later,
around<n>sunset, we finally make a<n>breakthrough!

text_block_list.name: Black Cat
text_block_list.text: Meow!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Mr. Kitty! You still have the ticket in<n>your mouth... Thank
goodness!
choice_data_list: All right, I'll take it from here.
All right, I'll take it from here.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Big Brother... I appreciate it.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Big Sister... I appreciate it.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But... I have to give it my all. Iwant to give it my all.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: So... here I go!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Having made up her mind, Rice walks<n>over to the bush
where the cat is<n>hiding.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Mr. Kitty! P-please don't run away—I<n>have something to tell
you.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
That ticket is very precious to me...<n>S-so I want you to give it
back!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pretty please... Meow!

text_block_list.name: Black Cat
text_block_list.text: Meow.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The black cat puts down the ticket<n>and walks away!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Mr. Kitty... Thanks so much!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: That's a relief... Big Brother, thanks<n>for helping out too!
choice_data_list: It's because you never gave up, Rice!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: That's a relief... Big Sister, thanks for<n>helping out too!
choice_data_list: It's because you never gave up, Rice!
It's because you never gave up, Rice!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Mhm... Only because you were with<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Mhm... Only because you were with<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
When you're by my side, I feel like I<n>can give it my all—like I
can do<n>anything.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
When you're by my side, I feel like I<n>can give it my all—like I
can do<n>anything.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: So, um... Big Brother...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: So, um... Big Sister...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Please take this ticket!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Um, actually... I bought two tickets.<n>You know, as thanks for
always<n>looking out for me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Um, actually... I bought two tickets.<n>You know, as thanks for
always<n>looking out for me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
W-would you come see this with me?<n>Or is going with me...
just a bother...
choice_data_list: Not at all—I'm happy you invited me!
Not at all—I'm happy you invited me!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: You mean it?! Th-thank goodness!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But as I take the ticket from Rice,<n>something concerning
catches my<n>eye...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh? By today, you mean—aaah!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: You're right! We have to hurry then!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In the end, Rice and I make it to the<n>theater in the nick of
time, somehow<n>managing to catch the evening show.
